alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 9:37AM PST until February 14 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Siskiyou County and the northern portions of the Shasta Valley. This includes the Klamath River Valley, portions of Interstate 5, Highway 96, Sawyers Bar Rd and the communities of Klamath River, Happy Camp and Somes Bar. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
